name: XYNZ Sticker Pack [Series 1]
description:
Finally our first sticker packs are up for sale!!
 
Each pack contains 2 of each of our freshest designs including Jeff Kariwha, Cheeky Chief, our B2B Celebration Heart Logo and heaps more.

WARNING: These packs are EXTREMELY 'Rich in Culture!'

name: #RICHINCULTURE Award Singlet [White]
description:
Inspired by the New Zealand Rugby Chiefs. This award was designed in celebraion of their back to back Super Rugby championship win. Congratulations brothers!!

#RICHINCULTUREAWARD

Printed on a 100% cotton, 150 GSM singlet. Fabric is pre shrunk to minimise shrinkage. Tees aren't fitted or loose they are just right.

MEASUREMENTS (CM)
(Body Width / Body Length)

S - 46 / 73
M - 49 / 77
L – 52 / 80
XL - 55 / 83
XXL - 58 / 85

Model in the slide show picture is wearing size L.

Ladies these are a unisex size singlet. We advise to order a size down for a tighter fit.

All singlets have extra length for that street style.

Stay 'Rich In Culture!'

name: Heart Logo Tee [Black/White]
description:
The XYNZ heart logo represents the love we share for NZ culture, design and family.

This heart is our appreciation of the NZ icon that is the silverfern, loved by proud kiwis everywhere for generations!!

#XYNZHEARTLOGO

Printed on a 100% cotton t-shirt. Fabric is pre shrunk to minimise shrinkage. Tees aren't fitted or loose they are just right.

MEASUREMENTS (CM)
(Body Width / Body Length)

S - 47 / 71
M - 52 / 75
L – 56.5 / 78.5
XL - 61 / 82
XXL - 64 / 83.5

Male model in the slideshow pictures wears a size XL. Both female models wear a size S.

Ladies these are a unisex size tee. We advise to order a size down for a tighter fit.

All tees have extra length for that street style.

Stay 'Rich In Culture!'























































White/Black, Red/White & Grey/Black are also available.

name: XYNZ-Money Bag Tee [Black]
description:
Our motto is to stay "RICH IN CULTURE!” That is why you may have noticed our Z has been branded as a dollar sign. This design is a cheeky pun on money and asset and it helps us remember to be true to ourselves, which is a massive part or staying rich in culture! 

And who doesn’t love the famous cartoon styled hand.

#XYNZMONEYBAG

Printed on a 100% cotton t-shirt. Fabric is pre shrunk to minimise shrinkage. Tees aren't fitted or loose they are just right.

MEASUREMENTS (CM)
(Body Width / Body Length)

S - 47 / 71
M - 52 / 75
L – 56.5 / 78.5
XL - 61 / 82
XXL - 64 / 83.5

Male model in the slideshow pictures wears a size XL. Both female models wear a size S.

Ladies these are a unisex size tee. We advise to order a size down for a tighter fit.

All tees have extra length for that street style.

Stay 'Rich In Culture!'

Also available in Teal.

name: Cheeky Chief Tee [Black]
description:
This design is inspired by one of our favourite Chief logos. The Cheeky Chief is staunch but is humble in all that he does. His respect he gives to those around him is what gains him respect back. 

Above all, the cheeky chief is cultured beyond measure and his richness in culture exceeds any material riches of this world.

#XYNZCHEEKYCHIEF

Printed on a 100% cotton t-shirt. Fabric is pre shrunk to minimise shrinkage. Tees aren't fitted or loose they are just right.

MEASUREMENTS (CM)
(Body Width / Body Length)

S - 47 / 71
M - 52 / 75

All tees have extra length for that street style.

Stay 'Rich In Culture!'

Also available in Red.

name: Heart Logo Hoodie [Black]
description:
The XYNZ heart logo represents the love we share for NZ culture, design and family.

This heart is our appreciation of the NZ icon that is the silverfern, loved by proud kiwis everywhere for generations!!

#XYNZHEARTLOGO

Printed on a 80% cotton, 20% poly hoodie. Fabric is 350gsm, anti-pill and heavy weight. Hoodies aren't fitted or loose they are just right with extra length. Hoodies have a shoestring cord, kangaroo pocket and a cotton lined hood.
